Some assistive technologies may require the use of a passthrough function before this keystroke. For more information, activate the button labeled “Explore your accessibility options”.

1. Ask the Mayor and Council

Ask the Mayor and Council
=========================

Please follow this
to submit a form to the Mayor and Council about questions or concerns regarding the Township of Howell.

1. [Ask the Mayor and Council](https://www.twp.howell.nj.us/353/Ask-the-Mayor-and-Council)
2. [Howell Council Contact Information](https://www.twp.howell.nj.us/Directory.aspx?did=5)
























### • Contact Us •

1. Howell Township Municipal Building
   4567 Rt 9 North, 2nd Floor
   Howell, NJ 07731-3382

   Phone:
   (732) 938-4500
   Hours: 8:30 am - 4:30 pm

   [Contact](https://www.twp.howell.nj.us/directory)
   Note: The Municipal Court & Police Dept. are located at 300 Old Tavern Road.
